scenario:
Visa Inc. (NYSE: V) is facing a securities class action lawsuit filed by the Rosen Law Firm. The lawsuit alleges that Visa made materially false and/or misleading statements and/or failed to disclose that it was not in compliance with federal antitrust laws and did not have effective internal programs and policies to assess and control compliance with these laws. The class period is from November 16, 2023 to September 23, 2024. 

Investors who purchased Visa securities during this period may be entitled to compensation without payment of any out-of-pocket fees or costs through a contingency fee arrangement. The lead plaintiff deadline is January 21, 2025. To join the class action, investors can visit https://rosenlegal.com/submit-form/?case_id=29131 or call Phillip Kim, Esq. at 866-767-3653.

The Rosen Law Firm has a track record of success in leadership roles, representing investors throughout the globe, and has recovered hundreds of millions of dollars for investors. The firm was ranked No. 1 by ISS Securities Class Action Services for number of securities class action settlements in 2017 and has been recognized by Lawdragon and Super Lawyers.
